definition: طمر ṭamara u i (ṭamr) to bury, inter, cover with earth (هـ s.th., esp. a corpse); ṭamara i to cover up (هـ a thing), fill up (هـ a well) طمر ṭimr pl. اطمار aṭmār old, tattered garment, fags, tatters طمر ṭimirr fiery steed, race horse طمر II (eg.) to curry(comb), rub down (هـ a horse) طمر ṭumār (eg.) currycomb
